channel.title: LAwithKids
channel.description: Los Angeles Podcast and Guide about Travel, Excursions, and activies with children. Guide For LA Parents. LA Restaurant reviews, Parks, Museums, Beaches, and virtually anything of interest to L.A. parents. Make sure you visit our shownotes page at LAwithKids.com. The #1 Parenting Podcast. A Los Angeles Travel Guide for Parents.

channel.itunes:subtitle: Los Angeles Guide and Podcast
channel.itunes:summary: LAwithKids.com is your guide to Los Angeles. If you live in LA or are planning on visiting, this is your guide. A special focus on activities for children and families. LA events and calendar.

item.title: LAwithKids.com #97 Our Los Angeles Guide gives Disneyland Tips and Hints and more
item.description: LAwithKids.com podcast #97 has a lot in store for you. First we tell you about how much we love gregory popovich's comedy pet theater. We recently saw him in Vegas and are very excited about him coming to the Los Angeles area. We then give you some Disneyland tips and hints and tell you about our recent stay at the Anaheim Hilton. They just introduced a waterslide and play structure. We also go to Captain Kidd's Buffet accross the street from the Disney parks.
item.itunes:keywords: anaheim hilton, captain kids buffet, disneyland with children
item.itunes:subtitle: LAwithKids.com #97 Our LA Guide visits the Disney Parks, Captain Kidds Buffet and the Anaheim Hilton
item.itunes:summary: LAwithKids.com the #1 Los Angeles Podcast and Parent Guide visits Disneyland, Captain Kidds Buffet and the Anaheim Hilton.

item.title: LAwithKids.com #89 Olivia's Dollhouse Tearoom
item.description: LAwithKids.com goes to a Birthday party at Olivia's Dollhouse Tearoom. We had high expectations, but unfortunately we had to leave what is probably our first negative review ever for LAwithKids.com. Please listen to LAwithKids.com to find out what we had to say about our experience at Olivia's Dollhouse Tearoom.
item.itunes:keywords: olivias dollhouse, tearoom, los angeles, birthday parties, party
item.itunes:subtitle: LAwithKids.com #89 A visit to Olivias Dollhouse Tearoom
item.itunes:summary: We visit Olivias Dollhouse Tearoom and are less than impressed. Listen to find out why are Los Angeles Guide and Podcast issued our first negative review.

item.title: LAwithKids.com #75 Los Angeles Podcast
item.description: Review of Legally Blonde at the Pantages Theatre. LAwithKids.com, the #1 Los Angeles guide for parents, review an incredible production of Legally Blonde the Musical. Very impressed with the performance of all the actors including Becky Gulsvig, D.B. Bonds, and Rhiannon Hansen.

item.title: LAwithKids.com #74 Los Angeles Podcast
item.description:
LA with Kids is the premeir Los Angeles guide for parents. This shows focus is on King Gillette Ranch in the Santa Monica Mountains. LA with Kids went to two campfires at his site and also has information about using the Santa Monica Parks for hiking and other progams.
Our Los Angeles guide also mentions the upcoming Legally Blonde playing at the Kodak Theatre as well as Madame Tussauds Hollywood. There is a coupon for Madame Tussauds Hollywood available at lawithkids.com.
Thanks to all of our listeners for making LA with Kids the top Los Angeles Podcast. Feel free to share this podcast with your friends and family.
We are always open to suggestion for future venues in Los Angeles to review. Just send as an e-mail via or form on the website.
item.author: Sabrina Weissler
item.itunes:author: Sabrina Weissler
item.itunes:keywords: King Gillette Ranch, Hiking in Los Angeles, LA hiking
item.itunes:subtitle: LAwithKids.com visits the King Gillette Ranch
item.itunes:summary: LAwithKids.com visits King Gillette Ranch.

item.comments: Los Angeles Podcast and Guide. LAwithKids.com visits CityWalk Hollywood

item.title: LAwithKids.com #72 Los Angeles Guide and Podcast
item.description:

We are glad that you are listener of LAwithKids.com. We encourage you to visit LAwithKids.com and check out our #1 site for LA parents and those traveling to the Los Angeles Area.
For advertising information, please visit or LAwithKids.com.
thanks

item.title: LAwithKids.com LA guide and Podcast #1
item.description: http://lawithkids.com The parenting podcast for Los Angeles Parents. A family guide to Los Angeles. Sabrina Weissler take you on a tour of Los Angeles with a focus on children. There are reviews of child friendly restaurants, beaches, museums, etc... We also have interview with in the know Los Angeles personalities. If you are an L.A. parent or traveling to LA you will love this podcast. We are proud to be the guide for Los Angeles Parents and Families.

item.title: LAwithKids.com show #2
item.description: http://lawithkids.com In this parenting podcast for Los Angeles Parents we will be discussing the Huntington Library and The Gardens of The World.
